channel.title: Comments on: Is There a Point to this Game?

item.title: By: Factory
item.dc:creator: Factory
item.description:
I dunno, I think this blog got a bit more creepy.
*thinks back to previous posts* Hmm maybe not.
item.content:encoded:
I dunno, I think this blog got a bit more creepy.

*thinks back to previous posts*
Hmm maybe not.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Different strokes for different folks. (zing!)
I think the SL creep factor for me is this: this game doesn't just dance around the blurry line dividing reality and fantasy (as most games inevitably do), the game would have you believe there is no line.
Traditional MMOGs, we have all that nonsense also, of course, but the larger populace has the good sense to mock it. Ya, we mock. Because it's so damn stupid.
item.content:encoded:
Different strokes for different folks. (zing!)

I think the SL creep factor for me is this: this game doesn’t just dance around the blurry line dividing reality and fantasy (as most games inevitably do), the game would have you believe there is no line.

Traditional MMOGs, we have all that nonsense also, of course, but the larger populace has the good sense to mock it. Ya, we mock. Because it’s so damn stupid.

item.title: By: qDot
item.dc:creator: qDot
item.description: What's so creepy about it? It's simple a structured development environment. It's the users that make it creepy, not the game itself. Give people the freedom to do what they want, and you'll suffer the consequences of people doing what they want. :)
item.content:encoded: What’s so creepy about it? It’s simple a structured development environment. It’s the users that make it creepy, not the game itself. Give people the freedom to do what they want, and you’ll suffer the consequences of people doing what they want. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Troggdor
item.dc:creator: Troggdor
item.description: is it just me or do the EYES in that last link's photos look reeeeeeeeeeeealy fukin creapy? I mean like "replaced with fake glass eyes" kind of creepy.
item.content:encoded: is it just me or do the EYES in that last link’s photos look reeeeeeeeeeeealy fukin creapy? I mean like “replaced with fake glass eyes” kind of creepy.
